languages.text: Для координации дальнейших действий Лорд-капитану необходимо провести совещание с приближенными.
To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.
languages.original_text: Для координации дальнейших действий Лорд-капитану необходимо провести совещание с приближенными.

traits.locale_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.
To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.
To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.
To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

languages.text: 为了协调接下来的目标，领主舰长必须与{mf|他|她}的随行人员举行一场会议。
languages.original_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: 为了协调接下来的目标，领主舰长必须与{mf|他|她}的随行人员举行一场会议。

languages.text: 次の行動の調整をするために、ロード・キャプテンは従者たちと会合を行う必要がある。
languages.original_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: 次の行動の調整をするために、ロード・キャプテンは従者たちと会合を行う必要がある。

languages.text: Para coordinar los siguientes pasos, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe reunirse con su séquito.
languages.original_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Para coordinar los siguientes pasos, {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán debe reunirse con su séquito.

languages.text: Um die nächsten Schritte zu koordinieren, muss der Lord Captain ein Treffen mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Entourage einberufen.
languages.original_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Um die nächsten Schritte zu koordinieren, muss der Lord Captain ein Treffen mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Entourage einberufen.

languages.text: Pour coordonner les prochaines étapes, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit consulter sa suite.
languages.original_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Pour coordonner les prochaines étapes, {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} doit consulter sa suite.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın sonraki adımları belirleyebilmesi için maiyetindekilerle toplantı yapması gerekiyor.
languages.original_text: To coordinate the next steps, the Lord Captain must hold a meeting with {mf|his|her} retinue.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan, sonraki adımlarını koordine edebilmek için maiyetindekilerle bir toplantı yapmalı.
